attributes.action: Partial TV licence refund as comp for the BBC’s manipulation of Trump videos
attributes.background: Discuss a partial refund to TV licence payers or discount on their next renewal.

rejection.details:
We are not clear what action you are calling for specifically. You can submit a new petition outlining more clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/748618
